sections.heading: Effectiveness against third persons of the pledge of other obligationsIf the thing pledged is another person's obligation not arising under the lease of an immovable, the pledge is effective against third persons only from the time that the obligor has actual knowledge of the pledge or has been give
sections.text: Effectiveness against third persons of the pledge of other obligationsIf the thing pledged is another person's obligation not arising under the lease of an immovable, the pledge is effective against third persons only from the time that the obligor has actual knowledge of the pledge or has been given notice of it.Acts 2014, No. 281, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2015.
